## Toast.hide() method

Dismiss a toast, e.g. in response to a user action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static hide(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, id?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace to dismiss a toast in. |
|  id | string | _(Optional)_ The toast ID, or undefined to clear any toast. |

**Returns:**

void
